meanings.definition: To love more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She outloves her sister by always showing her affection.
meanings.sent2: He outloves his dog and takes it for walks every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat outloves the dog by always snuggling up to its owner.
meanings.sent4: His passion for painting outloves his interest in any other hobby.
meanings.sent5: The sun outloves the moon in its ability to light up the sky.

meanings.sent1: Their love for each other outloves any other relationship.
meanings.sent2: The bond between the siblings outloves any rivalry they may have.
meanings.sent3: The puppy outloves its owner by wagging its tail non-stop.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outloves any negativity that comes her way.
meanings.sent5: The teacher outloves her students by always encouraging them to do their best.

meanings.definition: To have a greater love for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He outloves his favorite book and reads it multiple times.
meanings.sent2: She outloves her job and is always excited to go to work.
meanings.sent3: The child outloves ice cream and always asks for an extra scoop.
meanings.sent4: Their dedication outloves any obstacles that come their way.
meanings.sent5: The gardener outloves his plants and tends to them with care.
